cyclone.name: ARTHUR
cyclone.current_location: about 125 miles east of Melbourne, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast, then accelerating northeast, paralleling the U.S. East Coast toward the North Carolina Outer Banks
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just offshore of the Outer Banks, North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Surf City NC to Duck NC including Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coastline from east-central Florida northward to the Mid-Atlantic states
weather_observation.wind: Occasional breezy conditions possible; sustained tropical-storm-force winds are not expected at the port.
weather_observation.rainfall: Light rain showers possible; total accumulations generally below 1 inch.
